 }else{
 var result = "";
 }

}}" IndexNumber="3" WatermarkTextValue="" WatermarkTextVariable=""> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="4" WatermarkTextValue="" WatermarkTextVariable=""> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> </scg:List> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> <FlowStep.Next> <FlowStep x:Name="__ReferenceID7"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">872,147</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">273,92</av:Size> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity Compiler="{x:Null}" CurrentResult="{x:Null}" DataObject="{x:Null}" ExplicitDataList="{x:Null}" InputMapping="{x:Null}" InputTransformation="{x:Null}" OnResumeKeepList="{x:Null}" OutputMapping="{x:Null}" ParentServiceName="{x:Null}" ParentWorkflowInstanceId="{x:Null}" ResultTransformation="{x:Null}" ScenarioID="{x:Null}" ScopingObject="{x:Null}" ServiceHost="{x:Null}" SimulationOutput="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign (1)" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="273,92" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" SimulationMode="OnDemand" UniqueID="c0f5b453-eb68-410d-814b-815c7a840c48" UpdateAllOccurrences="False"> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="uaba:ActivityDTO" Capacity="4"> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[Fragment]]" FieldValue=" <style>
 #[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]] {
 position: absolute;
 <!-- Workflow Injected Styling -->
 height: [[resH]]; 
 width : [[resW]];
 background-color:#fff;
 }
 </style>
 <script src="/themes/system/js/ace.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
 <!-- syntax files -->
 <script src="/themes/system/js/mode-javascript.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
 <!--<script src="scripts/jsEditorSrc/mode-sql.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
 <script src="scripts/jsEditorSrc/mode-css.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
 <script src="scripts/jsEditorSrc/mode-xml.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
 <script src="scripts/jsEditorSrc/mode-html.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>-->
 <!-- theme -->
 <script src="/themes/system/js/theme-chrome.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
 <script>
 var editor;
 var demoData = new Array();
 var breakLine = "__BREAK__";
 
 $(document).ready(function(){
 init();
 restoreData();
 $('#[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]').focusout(function() { 
 /* Strip out ' and replace with " */
 var toSave = editor.getValue().replace(/'/g, '"');
 var toUse = toSave.replace(/(\r\n|\n|\r)/gm," ");
 toSave = toSave.replace(/(\r\n|\n|\r)/gm,breakLine);
 $("textarea#[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]saveRegion").val(toSave);
 $("textarea#[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]useRegion").val(toUse);
 });
 });
 
 
 function init(){
 editor = ace.edit("[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]");
 editor.setTheme("ace/theme/chrome");
 
 /* add code folding ;) */
 var session = editor.session;
 session.setFoldStyle("markbeginend");
 
 /* no wrap with 80 char print line ;) */
 session.setUseWrapMode(false);
 var renderer = editor.renderer;
 renderer.setPrintMarginColumn(80);
 
 var lang = "[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]Lang";
 var langSet = false;
 $("#[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]Lang option").each(function(){
 
 if($(this).val() == lang){
 $(this).attr("selected", "selected");
 langSet = true;
 }
 });
 
 /* Default to JS */
 if(!langSet){
 updateLang("ace/mode/javascript");
 } 
 }
 
 function updateLang(lang){
 if(lang == "vb"){
 lang = "";
 }
 
 editor.getSession().setMode(lang);
 }
 
 function restoreData(){
 
 /* Strip out ' and replace with " */
 
 var rVal = '[[[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]saveRegion]]';
 
 rVal = rVal.replace(/__BREAK__/gm,"\n");
 if(rVal != ""){
 /* or .insert() */
 $("[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]#saveRegion").val(rVal);
 if(rVal.indexOf("[[") == 0){
 rVal = ""; /* Blank out [[regionName]] as per the design mode wizard binding */
 }
 editor.setValue("");
 editor.insert(rVal);
 }
 }
 </script>
<div [[outterCustomSyle]] [[cssClass]]>
Syntax Mode : 
<select name="[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]Lang" onChange="updateLang(this.value)" id="[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]Lang" >
 <option value="ace/mode/javascript">JavaScript</option>
 <option value="vb">VB Script</option>
 
 <!--<option value="ace/mode/css">CSS</option>
 <option value="ace/mode/sql">SQL</option>
 <option value="ace/mode/xml">XML</option>
 <option value="ace/mode/html">HTML</option>-->
</select>

<br/><br/>
<div id="[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]" [[customStyle]] [[toolTip]] [[tabIndex]]></div>
<textarea style="display:none" name="[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]saveRegion" id="[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]saveRegion" >[[[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]saveRegion]]</textarea>
<textarea style="display:none" name="[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]useRegion" id="[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]useRegion" >[[[[Dev2elementNameScriptArea]]useRegion]]</textarea>
</div>" IndexNumber="1" WatermarkTextValue="Value" WatermarkTextVariable="[[Variable1]]"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="2" WatermarkTextValue="Value" WatermarkTextVariable="[[Variable2]]"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> </scg:List> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowDecision.True> <FlowDecision.False> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> </FlowDecision.False> </FlowDecision> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </FlowDecision.False> </FlowDecision> </Flowchart.StartNode> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID1</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID2</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID3</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID4</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID5</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID6</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID7</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID8</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID9</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID10</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID11</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID12</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>

Service.Comment: A Text area that has syntax highlighting for a number of languages
